column3: Enlightened leadership is spiritual if we understand spirituality not as some kind of religious dogma or ideology but as the domain of awareness where we experience values like truth, goodness, beauty, love and compassion, and also intuition, creativity, insight and focused attention.
I don't think of all the misery but of the beauty that still remains.

People often say that 'beauty is in the eye of the beholder,' and I say that the most liberating thing about beauty is realizing that you are the beholder. This empowers us to find beauty in places where others have not dared to look, including inside ourselves.
I love natural beauty, and I think it's your best look, but I think makeup as an artist is so transformative.
Although beauty may be in the eye of the beholder, the feeling of being beautiful exists solely in the mind of the beheld.
By plucking her petals, you do not gather the beauty of the flower.
That which God said to the rose, and caused it to laugh in full-blown beauty, He said to my heart, and made it a hundred times more beautiful.
Anyone who keeps the ability to see beauty never grows old.
The true beauty of music is that it connects people. It carries a message, and we, the musicians, are the messengers.
Flowers... are a proud assertion that a ray of beauty outvalues all the utilities of the world.
Look up, laugh loud, talk big, keep the color in your cheek and the fire in your eye, adorn your person, maintain your health, your beauty and your animal spirits.
The best part of beauty is that which no picture can express.

'Handsome' means many things to many people. If people consider me handsome, I feel flattered - and have my parents to thank for it. Realistically, it doesn't hurt to be good-looking, especially in this business.
Smiling is definitely one of the best beauty remedies. If you have a good sense of humor and a good approach to life, that's beautiful.
A horse is a thing of beauty... none will tire of looking at him as long as he displays himself in his splendor.
It is time for parents to teach young people early on that in diversity there is beauty and there is strength.

There are no better cosmetics than a severe temperance and purity, modesty and humility, a gracious temper and calmness of spirit; and there is no true beauty without the signatures of these graces in the very countenance.
'Beauty is truth, truth beauty,' - that is all ye know on earth, and all ye need to know.
Beauty is also submitted to the taste of time, so a beautiful woman from the Belle Epoch is not exactly the perfect beauty of today, so beauty is something that changes with time.
If the path be beautiful, let us not ask where it leads.
Let us live for the beauty of our own reality.

For thousands of years, human beings have been obsessed with beauty, truth, love, honor, altruism, courage, social relationships, art, and God. They all go together as subjective experiences, and it's a straw man to set God up as the delusion. If he is, then so is truth itself or beauty itself.
Heat cannot be separated from fire, or beauty from The Eternal.
The beauty is that through disappointment you can gain clarity, and with clarity comes conviction and true originality.
Beauty is in the eye of the beer holder.

Tramping is too easy with all this money. My days were more exciting when I was penniless and had to forage around for my next meal... I've decided that I'm going to live this life for some time to come. The freedom and simple beauty of it is just too good to pass up.
